title: Carbon Fiber Watch Face
summary: Modern analog watch face with a dark carbon fiber background for Android Wear!

Battery friendly with Elegant design.Features of the watch face: - Watch battery indicator.- Daily step count- Day of Week- Day of Month- Battery FriendlyApp shortcuts:-Click on the step indicator, Fit application will show up.-Click on the day indicator, Alarm Clock will show up.Supported devices:- Works on all Android Wear devicesMore watch faces - Discover our watchface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store:https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=NorthTribe+Ltdï»¿
descriptionHTML:
Carbon Fibre Watch Face for Android Wear!

Modern analog interactive watch face for Android wear with a dark carbon fiber background. Battery friendly with Elegant design.

Features of the watch face:

- Watch battery indicator.
- Daily step count
- Day of Week
- Day of Month
- Battery Friendly

App shortcuts:

-Click on the step indicator, Fit application will show up.
-Click on the day indicator, Alarm Clock will show up.


Supported devices:

- Works on all Android Wear devices

More watch faces

- Discover our watchface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=NorthTribe+Ltd﻿
comments: Let down by ambient mode A great looking watch face which is let down by a plain ambient mode. It would be better if the ticks and numbers were shown there.

Great clean look with a classic design yet modern touch. Just the pieces of data that I want quick access to. Best of all, battery life is amazing. Even with always on enabled and brightness of 3, the battery is only at 73% even after 10+ hours of normal use!
Not a bad looking watch face by any means, but if you're going to charge for the app then there needs to be customization options available.
Why not listed? After installation...why not listed on my adroid wear apps?...I can not install it...what should I do?. I have Huawei Watch with Samsung S7 edge....pls reply asap...thx
Nice graphics, but I need a square version for my Watch.
Attractive but can't change Settings Only option is to Install Settings.
recentChanges: Shortcuts to Google Fit app and Alarm clock added.
